divs: Sighting Detailsi was leaving a friends house looked up at the sky around sunset to the west and there was a really bright light thougt at first it was the cell tower but the light was to bright the sky was still blue and sun was just setting i looked at for a minute then drove to my brothers house to show him and he already notice it so me and my brothers kid went out and looked at it again for a couple of min went back inside for 5 min and went back out to look at it again and it was gone you could see it at sunset for about an half-hour it look close and low to the gound
Summary: look like a really bright star was not moving
trends: There have been no other sightings in Port Allegany
This sighting has never been favorited.
